title: Kalista Ghost Bug! Live on EUW

embed.description: Just uploading Video footage for Riot. Check my Last Video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WgTSrriqIHc

body:
I noticed something weird while being in a ranked game: Kalista send a Ghost to Dragon, and it got stuck inbetween Dragon and the Wall. It kind of bounced back in forth, so I am not sure if that is supposed to be like that, or not.
Please check the Video footage to have a look at it.




Guess it is going to be the first time, that I will read the bug fix section in the next patch... Just to see if my post helped :DDD
